payload.message: Check #Philosophy group (120363425915475884@g.us) for new messages from allowlist (+SCRIBE_3_PLACEHOLDER, +628116360610, +62811630409, +19095888622). Read group session history. Run health check: Execute `openclaw channels status` and parse output. If WhatsApp shows 'disconnected' or 'error', execute `openclaw gateway restart` and reply 'WA_DOWN: restarted'. If Discord shows 'stopped' or 'error', execute `openclaw gateway restart` and reply 'DISCORD_DOWN: restarted'. If both OK, reply 'HEALTHY_OK'.
